pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![](https://komarev.com/ghpvc/?username=ainayves&color=blueviolet)## Use openai chat-gpt on your CLI`cgpt` is a Python module that allows you to use Chat-GPT directly in your favorite Terminal.### ‚≠ê FEATURES- AI conversation exactly the same as in openai website- LAN support (you can use cgpt inside a LAN)### REQUIREMENTS- python >=3.7- openai API KEY : You need to register on openai to receive your own api key , here : [api_key](https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys).### SETUP```pip install cgpt```### ‚èØÔ∏è VERIFY INSTALLATION ```cgpt-version```### üöÄ RUN```cgpt```### üîó CGPT INSIDE A LOCAL NETWORKYou can use cgpt inside a LAN. - You just need one Host (`connected to internet`) to be the server.- Other Hosts (`not connected to internet`) can ALWAYS use Chat GPT as `client`. NOTES : - For now , a server must be launched inside a `Linux` computer . If the server is inside `Windows` : the address is sometimes wrong (to be fixed in the next version). - Also , make sure that your `/etc/hosts` is configured correctly like :```127.0.0.1localhost127.0.1.1your-hostanme```- A `client` can also use his own api_key in the next version.### GITHUB- [cgpt](https://github.com/ainayves/cgpt/)
